ValidationRule.description: Origin of Root Cause and Root Cause 2nd Level required to close case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')) ,RecordType.Name ='Sales2Service Case' , OR(ISPICKVAL(Origin_of_Root_Cause__c, '') , ISPICKVAL(Root_Cause_2nd_Level__c, '')) , ISCHANGED( Status ) , OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Closed - Client Issue Completed') , ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Closed - Client Unresponsive') , ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Closed - Sent to PAC')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Origin of Root Cause and Root Cause 2nd Level required to close case.
